text: Great food and lovely service.
態度惡劣！在只有3度的情況下，要抱住BB在外等，餐廳內是有空枱下，係好無道理，唔想做優惠就不要做！永遠不再光顧！
Big up Kenny, love this place ! Excellent food and great service.
Superb dim sum and hot and sour soup.

Great atmosphere and the food was great. Polite staff. Could have slightly dimmed the lights in the evening. Busy on Saturday and food came out really at a good pace and no long waits.

Really good dim sum for very good prices, service is speedy and I enjoyed the free tea refills. The place is well decorated and clean. Recommend the custard buns, they are amazing.
Their dim sum are really good

Wooow! Their Pekín duck crepes are AMAZING. Overall all the food was pretty tasty and good. But for sure the dish I loved the most was their Pekin duck crepes. If you come here don’t forget to try them. The only thing was that their staff …
The service is remarkable!
Wonderful food, excellent service, the staff had no issue when we asked for some time between courses. Definitely worth a visit.
